lyric:
[00:01.729]
[00:08.160]Hello, hello world Hello, hello world
[00:19.259]
[00:37.061]I’m feeling alive yeah We own the night
[00:44.280]I’ll be your wonder So hello my world
[00:51.088]
[00:53.348]Never been so high Feeling happy inside
[00:56.949]I think of you everyday Running through the night Between you and I
[01:04.271]We need more time, won’t you stay
[01:07.088]
[01:07.408]You got me feeling like a star tonight Nothing has ever really glowed so bright
[01:14.608]Holding my hand, you can follow the steps I take
[01:18.674]
[01:21.715]Nothing that can break us We know it
[01:27.406]Keep going
[01:28.906]We fight what’s bigger than us We know it
[01:34.711]Keep going
[01:36.019]
[01:36.763]We hold it together
[01:40.569]I don’t wanna let it go Hello, hello my world Hello my world
[01:56.683]Hello my world
[02:00.584]
[02:33.382]I’m feeling alive yeah We own the night
[02:40.641]I’ll be your wonder
[02:44.192]So hello my world
[02:47.480]
tlyric:
[by:星羽受]
[00:08.160]Hello, hello world Hello, hello world
[00:37.061]我宛若新生般的 今晚属于你与我
[00:44.280]我将是你的奇迹 快对这世界说嗨
[00:53.348]未曾经历的欢脱 由内而外的喜悦
[00:56.949]整天都在思念你 飞奔着划过夜幕 就在你与我之间
[01:04.271]余下时间就你我
[01:07.408]助我发亮的是你 从未发觉的光芒
[01:14.608]牵起手照我的来
[01:21.715]无以破坏的关系 你与我心知肚明
[01:27.406]就继续向前进发
[01:28.906]战胜更强的未知 你与我心照不宣
[01:34.711]就继续向前进发
[01:36.763]你与我一路同在
[01:40.569]从不想就此放弃 Hello, hello my world Hello my world
[01:56.683]Hello my world
[02:33.382]我宛若新生般的 今晚属于你与我
[02:40.641]我将是你的奇迹
[02:44.192]快对这世界说嗨
